mapper.sql: cf.CHANGE_GUID, cf.BEFOR_FSTATE, cf.AFTER_FSTATE, cf.TYPE, cf.TB_ID, cf.MODIFY_TIME, cf.MODIFY_USERID, cf.MODIFY_USERNAME
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_change_fstate( CHANGE_GUID, BEFOR_FSTATE, AFTER_FSTATE, TYPE, TB_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USERID, MODIFY_USERNAME ) select tu.* from
SELECT sys_guid(),#{changeFstate.beforFstate},#{changeFstate.afterFstate}, #{changeFstate.type},#{tbId},#{changeFstate.modifyTime},#{changeFstate.modifyUserid},#{changeFstate.modifyUsername} from dual tu
